text_block_list.text:
The day of the Semiannual Race Meet. 
Ines Fujin's family was among the spectators in the stands.

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text: Ines told us all about what happened. We're all here to see her gallant fig- ughuck…!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
Oh, excuse me…… To think she's really here, at this academy, 
giving her all in the races she loves so much…!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
Ines always loved to run. Since she was little, she'd be running 
up and down the track all day long. She ran in a club team, too.

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
But around the end of elementary school… my health 
started to deteriorate, and she was so earnestly trying to 
help me out, she started missing trainings…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
What? Training with the club team? 
Hmmm… but family is most important to me!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
Gradually, the gap with her peers grew larger… But it's true 
I really needed her help… they were truly frustrating times.

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
She's always helping out, putting others before her… 
All this time I'd hoped a day would come when she could 
devote herself to her beloved races…

―― The noise in the stands was dying down. Everyone's gazes 
shifted towards the gate as the race got underway.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The Semiannual Race Meet's 2400m turf race has begun! 
Ines Fujin gets off to a great start and takes the lead!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haah……!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Ines Fujin is setting the pace in the lead! 
Further back, everyone has their eyes on Mejiro Ryan, 
who is holding steady and saving her energy!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: "Secrets to 'running': My pace"?

I'd decided on Ines Fujin's strategy for the Meet. 
Now we just needed to work on her being able to implement it.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
So you made this? 
Ahaha, oh look at you, as dedicated as ever～!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Let's see… increasing running ability through improved form…… 
effective breathing techniques to restore stamina……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
…… Hmmh, so that's a thing…… 
…………

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (Haa, hah, haa―! Wide stride, wide swings, control the distance behind ― aagh……!)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaahhh!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… I can do this!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The pack is being stretched as they exit the final corner and 
onto the last straight! Ines Fujin still leads, but hot 
on her heels as expected is… Mejiro Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Taaaaahh!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
(As I thought, Ryan still has energy left……! 
Before, she would have caught me ― but! Not this time!)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
(I've been working hard with my trainer, getting stronger! 
So I won't lose…… I won't lose!!)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: This is my straight……!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Ines Fujin's pace is relentless! Can she outrun Ryan? 
Will she be caught? Ines?! Ryan?! The winner is―!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: DAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Ines Fujin!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hah…… ghah, haaah! ……haah…… pheeew…… …… Yeah, it still…… feels good…… heh.

text_block_list.name: Ines' Little Sisters
text_block_list.text: Siiis!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ― Girls! Hwuuh… did you see? What'd you think of your big sis, huh!?

text_block_list.name: Ines' Twin Sister A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! It was awesome! So cool! 
You were 100 times stronger than before!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Twin Sister B
text_block_list.text: Sis, sis! I wanna see you race more!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
You found a good trainer, didn't you. 
Look how strong you've become……!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
(……! This scene…… mom and everyone running up to me, 
crying and laughing. It's just like that day ―)

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
First place goes to Ines Fujin! On her last race for 
the club's junior high division, she set down a splendid 
result to take home the honors!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Twin Sister A
text_block_list.text:
That's great, that's great! I knew it! So cool! 
Sis, you're the coolest!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Twin Sister B
text_block_list.text:
You're not really quitting are you? 
You're gonna keep racing, right? Right?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
(Back then, it was them as well. Putting the sparkle in my races, 
giving me that push in the back, and so, that's why, I ―)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
………… 
…… I'm sorry, mom. I ―

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I'll take a part-time job and send lots of money back home. 
I'll come back often to help out. But I… 
I want to go to Tracen Academy……!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I still…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I'm still going to run!

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
……! 
But of course. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I won! Oh, and mom wanted to 
give you her thanks? or something—

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mother
text_block_list.text:
This is the result of your guidance. Thank you very much. 
Please keep up the good work, Trainer.

"I'm only training her temporarily", I thought. 
Ines Fujin stopped me before I could say it out loud.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I'd like my "trainer" to be full of confidence. 
Because we'll be working together!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Like say, I'd want to hear the most wonderful pick-up line 
at just the right moment. Something that makes me 
want to reply with an immediate "yes"!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I was able to run like today because of you. It was you who led 
me all the way here. …You know what I want you to say, right?

She's certainly grown a lot. Of course, it's all thanks to her 
hard work… But, maybe I was able to help her out a little.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Yeah?
choice_data_list: I want to watch you run, by my side, forever.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
……! 
Ahaha! Yep, you passed!

Later, after seeing her family off…… 
Ines Fujin teasingly poked me in the side.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, well, you know…! You were this little timid trainer and 
now look at you taking charge and wooing horsegirls～

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
It really made me happy. I'm looking forward 
to our time together! …I'll let you watch me run 
until your head's going in circles♪ Hehe.

Her smile was radiant and full of hope. 
For sure, the person reflected in her round eyes had grown —
Even I could feel that way.

And so a usually cheerful, friendly, and "sisterly" girl, 
who loves nothing more than to race once she stands 
on the turf, entered my daily life.
